titleStmt.title: A present for such as have been sick and are recovered, or, A discourse concerning the good which comes out of the evil of affliction being several sermons preached after his being raised from a bed of languishing / by Nathanael Vincent.
titleStmt.author: Vincent, Nathanael, 1639?-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.S. for Tho. Parkhurst,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
